long_description: The Ruffwear DoubleBack dog harness lets your pooch go climbing, mountaineering, canyoneering and scrambling with strength-rated components, comfort and convenience. Harness is strength-rated to 2,000 lbs. (8.9kN). Features strength-rated anodized aluminum lace-back buckles, webbing and tie-in point. Strength-rated, adjustable martingale offers a customizable fit. Ruffwear DoubleBack dog harness has padded belly support along with an adjustable frame and leg loops to disperse weight and enhance your dog's comfort. Leg loops tuck away for increased mobility during approaches.
short_description: The Ruffwear DoubleBack dog harness lets your pooch go climbing, mountaineering, canyoneering and scrambling with strength-rated components, comfort and convenience.
